chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:
I need to return the iPhone because I'm not comfortable with using it. I've always had an Android device, and that's what I'm used to. I can't figure out how to use this iPhone safely. Therefore, I'll be returning it and requesting a refund of the purchase price.
Please excuse me.

Thank you very much, Petra Karcher

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer.

Regards,
CH
